required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on April 10, 2017
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Air Pollution and Lipids Metabolic Disorder
clinical_study.official_title: Air Pollution and Lipids Metabolic Disorder

brief_summary.textblock: To determine the effect of ambient PM2.5 exposures at "low levels" in Southeastern Michigan and "high levels" in beijing on lipid metabolism among healthy adults without CV disease.

primary_outcome.description: Analyzed HDL and LDL and TG by ultracentrifugation and HPLC

secondary_outcome.description: Analyzed systemic inflammation biomarkers,such as C-reaction Protein and Blood coagulation by ELISA
Vascular endothelial function measured by EndoPat2000

study_pop.textblock: We will maintain enrollment criteria of the in-progress study being 50 healthy adults without CV disease or risk factors

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- without CV disease or risk factors (e.g., hypertension, diabetes, or treated hyperlipidemia). Subjects are non-smokers in non-smoking household.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Screening visit BP>140/90 mm Hg, fasting glucose >126 mg/dL, or positive urine pregnancy test (females). Subjects cannot be taking any medications or over-the-counter drugs that affect CV function.

overall_official.affiliation: Peking University School of Public Health

responsible_party.investigator_title: Peking University School of Public Health
